channel.title: Need invisible tiles - help?
channel.description:
Ok, I want to make the map invisible but be able to 'walk' around. I've tried disabling the maps from loading, you get no tiles but you can't move anywhere. Now i'm assuming you need the floor tiles to click on, am i correct? you need the mouse coordinates to intersect a triangle (in screen coordinates) in the tile/object.
What I think I need to do is create 0 height standard tiles as objects for the mouse system but to not actually draw them on the screen....... YES/NO?
Anyone know if that's correct/possible?
Show you why, might help.... [IMG]http://i219.photobucket.com/albums/cc76/MrPotatoHead2/sc1.jpg[/img]
